item.description: We've been looking for a place since the Kinsale Inn changed the Burger night... So I stopped in the Taverna for lunch today and the ENTIRE menu is half price all day. The food is pretty good and the atmosphere works for our crowd.... I hope you can come.. Good salads, burgers and dinners.... See you then !
item.how_to_find_us: As the Hostess... We'll try to sit by the fireplace

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: 1/2 Price Menu at the Sandwich Taverna
